author: svantetobias
content: Is BLS key generation available in any HSM like Ledger, Trezor or YubiHSM? Or are anyone working on it?

author: bitfalls
content: It is not available on hardware wallets yet, no. It would be hard to be working on this because we don't know the derivation paths or other standards we'll use for those wallets yet.
